infoSection.title: What is RoomCtrl and who is it for?

adHoc.title: Ad-hoc meetings
adHoc.content: Quick and flexible meeting space management – RoomCtrl allows instant room bookings without prior planning. Perfect for spontaneous team meetings or 1:1 conversations.

reservations.title: Reservations
reservations.content: Organize your space on your terms – the system enables recurring, automated bookings with control over time, participants, and availability, tailored to your organization's schedule.

queuing.title: Queuing
queuing.content: Automated access queue management – when resources are limited, RoomCtrl ensures fair access to rooms or workstations through a system of queues, notifications, and schedules.

schools.title: Schools
schools.content: For schools and universities – intelligent classroom planning – RoomCtrl supports daily scheduling, classroom bookings, and control over educational resources.

business.title: Business
business.content: Efficient office space organization – the system simplifies the management of meeting rooms and hot-desking, while also providing space usage reporting and support for hybrid work.
